AvailabilityDump.description: Verifies whether an RDF dump is provided in the VoID description of the dataset.
AvailabilityDump.metric_calculation: 1 if the VoID description has an indication of an RDF dump, otherwise 0.

MachineReadableLicense.metric: Machine-readable indication of a license in the VoID description.
MachineReadableLicense.description: Verifies if there's an indication of a machine-readable indication of a license in the VoID description of the dataset.
MachineReadableLicense.metric_calculation: 1 if the VoID description has a machine-readable indication of a license, otherwise 0.

AuthenticityOfDataset.description: Verifies there's someone responsible for the data (creator, contributor or publisher) and indication of the origin of the data (source or provenance) in the VoID description of the dataset.
AuthenticityOfDataset.metric_calculation: 1 if the VoID description has indication of someone responsible for the data, as well as indication of the origin of the data; otherwise 0.

PresenceMetadata.metric: Human-readable labelling of classes, properties and entities as well as presence of metadata.
PresenceMetadata.description: Verifies the presence of a title, description and homepage in the VoID description of the dataset.
PresenceMetadata.metric_calculation: 1 if the VoID description contains a title, description and homepage, otherwise 0.

ExemplaryResources.metric: Indication of one or more exemplary URIs
ExemplaryResources.description: Verifies if there's and indication of at least one exemplary URI in the VoID description of the dataset.
ExemplaryResources.metric_calculation: 1 if the VoID description has an indication of an exemplary URI, otherwise 0.

URIRegexPressence.metric: Indication of a regular expression that matches the URIs of a dataset
URIRegexPressence.description: Verifies if there's and indication of a regular expression for the URIs of the dataset, in the VoID description of the dataset.
URIRegexPressence.metric_calculation: 1 if the VoID description has an indication of a regular expression for the URIs, otherwise 0.

URISpacePressence.metric: Indication of a regular expression that matches the URIs of a dataset
URISpacePressence.description: Verifies if there's and indication of the URI namespace for the URIs of the dataset, in the VoID description of the dataset.
URISpacePressence.metric_calculation: 1 if the VoID description has an indication of the URI namespace, otherwise 0.

VocabularyExistence.metric: Indication of the vocabularies used in the dataset
VocabularyExistence.description: Verifies if a list of vocabularies used in the dataset is provided in the VoID description of the dataset.
VocabularyExistence.metric_calculation: 1 if the VoID description has an indication of the vocabularies used in the dataset, otherwise 0.

SerializationFormats.metric: Provision of the data in different serialization formats
SerializationFormats.description: Verifies if the data is provided in different serialization formats, by checking the VoID description of the dataset
SerializationFormats.metric_calculation: 1 if the VoID description has an indication of the serialization formats, otherwise 0.
